actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent law the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.
short_title: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act of 2007

summary.text: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

titles.title: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent law the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.
